item.description:
We will be meeting up for appetizers / dinner @ Pho Dakao before heading over to Gilrein's.
Last time we dined here it was great! Everyone enjoyed what they ordered : )
This Vietnamese restaurant is reasonably priced. They serve beer & wine and some exotic non- lacohol drinks.. Try the Sparkling Lime : ) Delicious! There is ample parking.

*I am not sure if they will do separate checks? So, if this is the case, I hate to ask but... please make sure you bring enough cash to pay your bill!

*NOTE:IF YOU JUST WANT TO JOIN US FOR DINNER, AND NOT GILREIN'S .. NO PROBLEM : ) I will try to be there earlier . Depending on how many respond I will work on a reservation.
Hope to see you there.
_Jo
item.how_to_find_us: When entering the restaurant ask for the meetup table. There will also be a meetup sign on the table.
item.why: The last time we went to Pho Dakao it was great! Everyone enjoyed what they ordred : ) It's reasonably priced, they do serve wine & beer and has had some very good reviews.
item.name: Dine Out @ "PHO DAKAO" before Gilrein's
